item.title: Global Money and the Decline of State Power
item.description: Underhill, Geoffrey R.D. “Global Money and the Decline of State Power.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 115-135. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Global governance; Globalization; Money and finance; Authority; Markets; States Text access (external link)
